00017 GLuint LoadTextureFromBmp(char *fname, GLenum format, GLuint filter)
00018 {
00019         HBITMAP hBmp;
00020         BITMAP Bmp;
00021         char buf[40];
00022         GLuint t;
00023         int n;
00024 
00025         // number of data components
00026         switch ( format )
00027         {
00028         case GL_RGB: 
00029         case GL_BGR_EXT: n = 3; break;
00030         case GL_RGBA:
00031         case GL_BGRA_EXT: n = 4; break;
00032         case GL_LUMINANCE: n = 1; break;
00033         default: n = 1;
00034         }
00035 
00036         glGenTextures(1, &t);

00039         hBmp = (HBITMAP)LoadImage(NULL, fname, IMAGE_BITMAP, 0, 0, LR_LOADFROMFILE | LR_CREATEDIBSECTION);
00040         if (hBmp == NULL)
00041         {
00042                 sprintf_s(buf, "Cannot load: %s file!", fname);
00043                 throw std::exception(buf);
00044                 return 0;
00045         }
00046 
00047         GetObject(hBmp, sizeof(Bmp), &Bmp);
00048         
00049         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 4);
00050         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, t);
00051         
00052         //glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT);
00053         //glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_REPEAT);
00054 
00055         // create texture using appropriate filter
00056         switch ( filter )
00057         {
00058         case GL_NEAREST:
00059         case GL_LINEAR:
00060                 {
00061                         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, filter);
00062                         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, filter);
00063                         glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, n, Bmp.bmWidth, Bmp.bmHeight,
00064                                                  0, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, Bmp.bmBits);
00065                         break;
00066                 }
00067         case GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST:
00068         case GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR:
00069                 {
00070                         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00071                         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, filter);
00072                         gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_2D, n, Bmp.bmWidth, Bmp.bmHeight,
00073                                                       format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, Bmp.bmBits);
00074                         break;
00075                 }
00076         }
